mapper.select: SELECT upm.upm_id, upm.u_id, u.u_name, p.p_id, p.p_name FROM rt_up_manager upm LEFT JOIN rt_project p ON upm.p_id = p.p_id LEFT JOIN rt_user u ON upm.u_id = u.u_id WHERE upm.p_id IN ( SELECT upm.p_id FROM rt_up_manager upm WHERE u_id = #{uid} )
SELECT u.u_id as mid, u.u_name as memberName FROM rt_up_participant upp LEFT JOIN rt_user u ON upp.u_id = u.u_id WHERE upp.p_id = #{pid} and upp.upp_status=1;
SELECT u_id, u_name FROM rt_user WHERE u_status = 20
SELECT upp_id, u_id, p_id, upp_status FROM rt_up_participant WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND p_id = #{p_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rt_up_participant (upp_id, u_id, p_id, upp_starttime) VALUES (#{uppid}, #{uid}, #{pid}, #{startTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE rt_up_participant SET upp_status = #{status} WHERE p_id = #{pid} AND u_id = #{uid}
UPDATE rt_up_participant SET upp_status = 0 AND upp_endtime = #{endTime} WHERE u_id = #{uid} AND p_id = #{pid}
